description:
~ FIXED LINKING ISSUE
~ New base 2.25.22.80
~ New Liquid Glass style (for Android 13 and above)
1.- Motion photos are now supported
2.- Now you can scan documents
3.- Temporary status (Depending on your region)
4.- Sharing status with Imagine AI
5.- You can now separate groups from chats into a separate tab
6.- Added an option to mention everyone in a group
7.- Added 2 new options to the navigation bar settings, you can change the icon and text size
8.- New section "Animations", It will show an animation when you touch the screen
9.- Some bugs fixed
